altername_name: Was Ist Was: Versunkene Schaetze: Das Abenteuerspiel
Was Ist Was: Lost Treasures: The Adventure Game
name: Was Ist Was: Versunkene Schätze: Das Abenteuerspiel
overview: Sunken treasures from the series "What's What" combines playing, learning and knowledge on the Nintendo DS. Knowledge transfer in a new, exciting and playful way! Numerous mini-games and knowledge quiz with collectible extras.
